actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

official_title: To improve aviation security by requiring air carriers to install certain explosive detection equipment at airports and to use explosive resistant cargo containers on aircraft, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Aviation Antiterrorism Act of 1996 - Amends Federal aviation law to direct the Administrator of the Federal Aviation Administration to set minimum standards for the mandatory installation and use by commercial and foreign air carriers of explosive detection equipment and explosive resistant cargo containers. Amends the Airport and Airway Improvement Act of 1982 to authorize the Administrator to make grants to air carriers to install such equipment.

titles.title: To improve aviation security by requiring air carriers to install certain explosive detection equipment at airports and to use explosive resistant cargo containers on aircraft, and for other purposes.
